name: Unstable Energies
description: Inflicts Magic Damage to a target and temporarily decreases its Dodge Rate.

name: Ethereal Vision
description: Cancels stealth and invisibility effects on any targets within close proximity of you.

name: Ethereal Healing
description: [Guild] Heals guild members that are within the targeted area. Will also heal yourself if you are within the targeted area.

name: Elemental Overcharge
description: Temporarily increases Elemental Attack of you and your target.

name: Superior Evocation
description: Grants additional Attack Power and Accuracy when using a staff.

name: Sudden Deluge
description: Inflicts Water Damage to targets within a certain radius and temporarily decreases their Critical Hit Success Rate.

name: Mental Severance
description: Temporarily reduces the Intelligence and Wisdom of both your current target and other targets close to it.

name: Vampiric Impact
description: Inflicts a Damage on a target and converts some of its damage to your HP.

name: Volatile Combustion
description: Inflicts Fire Damage to targets within a certain radius and temporarily decreases their Skill Block Rate.

name: Teachings of the Archmage
description: [Party] Temporarily increases the Intelligence, Wisdom and Attack Power of both you and party members within close proximity.

name: Antimagic
description: You place a ward over the current target removing any magical effects from them, being positive or negative. (Higher ranks allow more targets within close proximity to be affected.)
